Title: XML External Entity (XXE) Processing in TYPO3 Core
Description: All XML processing within the TYPO3 CMS are vulnerable to XEE processing. This can lead to load internal and/or external (file) content within an XML structure. Furthermore it is possible to inject arbitrary files for an XML Denial of Service attack. For more information on that topic see https://www.owasp.org/index.php/XML_External_Entity_(XXE)_Processing.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.19, all versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.4
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.19 before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.4
